channel.title: Omg help me please?
channel.description:
Ok, i dunno where else to post this so sorry if its wrong section.
ok i remade the red splater sprite put on client, but it has black box around it, i made it transparent on phtoshop and still nuthing.
[code] PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, -4, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, [/code]
i chnaged the 0 to -4 and it sumtiems removes the black box but randomly, so if anyoen can help! that woudl be great!
